Html:
When I use this options, seems rawr try evaluate all piece of gear in database regardless the gear filter I have.

At least in status bar I can see a lot of pieces that isnt selected by actual filter. Can it be changed? Or if it have to evaluate all, can it have a options to change filters AFTER the update list is built?

Some times i want do a lot of lists, like best triumph gear and best conquest gear, and running every time for all is a pain.
It should only be considering gear that matches the current filter setting... Sounds like a bug got introduced at some point, I'll look into it.
